Interface AutoFocusDeviceInternal

    DeviceInternal

    public interface AutoFocusDeviceInternal
extends DeviceInternal
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCurrentScore()
      Returns the current focus score
      double getLastScore()
      Returns the last focus score.
      double getOffset()
      Returns the current offset.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if the autofocus is enabled.
      boolean isLocked()
      Returns true if auto-focus is locked.

      Runs a full focus search.

      Runs an incremental focus search.

             throws MicroscopeException
        Returns the last focus score.

                throws MicroscopeException

        Returns:

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enable,
                int accessID)
         throws MicroscopeException,
                MicroscopeLockedException
        Enables or disables the auto-focus device.
        Parameters:
        enable - True, if focus should be engabled.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
           throws MicroscopeException
        Returns true if the autofocus is enabled.
        Returns:
        True if enabled.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked()
          throws MicroscopeException
        Returns true if auto-focus is locked.
        Returns:
        True if locked.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException

      • runFullFocus

        void runFullFocus(int accessID)
           throws MicroscopeException,
                  MicroscopeLockedException
        Runs a full focus search.
        Parameters:
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • runIncrementalFocus

        void runIncrementalFocus(int accessID)
                  throws MicroscopeException,
                         MicroscopeLockedException
        Runs an incremental focus search.
        Parameters:
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.

               int accessID)
        throws MicroscopeException,
               MicroscopeLockedException
        Sets the current offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - Offset to set.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.

        MicroscopeException
        MicroscopeLockedException
